description: Sends a cancel request for a specified task. You can cancel a task only if it's still in a QUEUED state. Tasks that are already running can't be cancelled.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The ID of the task that you are attempting to cancel. You can retrieve a task ID by using the ListTasks operation.

nested_items.name: taskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the task that you are attempting to cancel.
